thread.title: Energy Regulator Alleges Total Manipulated U.S. Natural Gas Market
thread.title_full: Energy Regulator Alleges Total Manipulated U.S. Natural Gas Market - WSJ

author: Sarah Kent
title: Energy Regulator Alleges Total Manipulated U.S. Natural Gas Market
text:
LONDON—U.S. regulators have accused French oil firm Total SA of manipulating the price of natural gas in the southwest between June 2009 and June 2012.
According to a notice published by the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission on Monday, traders at the French company’s Houston-based subsidiary, over the course of the three years, conducted a scheme in which uneconomic trades in the physical market were made to move prices in a way...
